snippet: The Power of the Riff Festival with Sunn O))) on Sunday night at Warsaw in Brooklyn.
abstract: Ben Ratliff on the Power of the Riff, a festival of heavy music at the club Warsaw in Greenpoint, Brooklyn; contrasts the low frequencies and physical power of band Sunn O))) with the pure aggression of hardcore bands filling out the rest of the bill.
lead_paragraph: The Power of the Riff Festival with Sunn O))) on Sunday night at Warsaw in Brooklyn.

headline.seo: Power of the Riff Festival, With Sunn O))), in Brooklyn
headline.main: Think You Know Loud? Try Throbbing Sound as the Body Vibrates
headline.print_headline: Think You Know Loud? Try Throbbing Sound as the Body Vibrates
